column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I live near Blacksburg , Virginia and often stay with friends who live near Virginia Tech .
#text=A bus route stops at their apartment complex and we often ride it downtown to eat brunch after a late night .
#text=We get ready and go to the bus stop .
#text=There 's a bench and it 's covered but there 's no doors .
#text=The bus is always on time and we hop on .
#text=It 's never crowded so we can always find a seat .
#text=The varying bus drivers are nice and we hop on , pay , and take our seats .
#text=The ride downtown takes about 10 minutes because of other stops .
#text=No other passengers ever talk to each other and honestly groups of friends from different races stick together .
#text=Being near a college such as Virginia Tech makes for a very diverse area where different cultures intermingle but the bus seems to have the most obviously segregated groups .
#text=We get to our stop and enjoy brunch .
#text=I like riding the bus because of the convenience factor , no parking , and it feels like we are doing something to help the environment .
